question: The chart shows customer satisfaction levels. Which statement is correct according to the chart data?

options.A: Very Satisfied has the highest satisfaction level among all categories.
options.B: Neutral customers represent about half of Satisfied customers.
options.C: Neutral and Dissatisfied combined represent over 25% of customers.
options.D: Satisfied has the highest percentage at 42.3%.

explanation: Labels show Satisfied at 42.3% (highest), so D is correct. The pie slices use visual sizes that don't match the percentagesâ€”Neutral's slice appears large but its actual percentage is only 12.8%, making B a tempting but misleading choice.
